SourceText: Letâ€™s see how {F1_FATHER} and {F1_DAUGHTER_13} spend one-on-one time together:
text: Kom ons kyk hoe {F1_FATHER} en {F1_DAUGHTER_13} een-tot-een tyd saam deurbring:

SourceText: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œ{F1_DAUGHTER_13}, how was your day?â€
text: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œ{F1_DAUGHTER_13}, hoe was jou dag?â€

SourceText: **{F1_DAUGHTER_13}**: â€œMy day was good, {F1_FATHER}. I just came from school.â€
text: **{F1_DAUGHTER_13}**: â€œMy dag was lekker, Pa. Ek kom nou van die skool af.â€

SourceText: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œI have 5 minutes of one-on-one time to spare before I have to drive to work again. What would you like to do together?â€
text: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œEk kan 5 minute een-tot-een tyd afknyp voordat ek weer werk toe moet ry. Wat wil jy graag saam met my doen?â€

SourceText: **{F1_DAUGHTER_13}**: â€œI was about to do my Science homework. The topic for the homework is to make something out of recycled materials. Could you please help me with it?â€
text: **{F1_DAUGHTER_13}**: â€œEk wou nou net begin met my Wetenskap-huiswerk. Die onderwerp van die huiswerk is om iets uit herwinbare materiale te maak. Kan Pa my asseblief daarmee help?â€

SourceText: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œI would be happy to!â€
text: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œEk sal dit met plesier doen!â€

SourceText: **{F1_DAUGHTER_13}**: â€œI thought of building a recycled house using old bottles, boxes, and other recycled materials. Look! I picked these up on my way home. They were thrown away by the side of the road and outside the spaza shops.â€
text: **{F1_DAUGHTER_13}**: â€œEk het gedink ek sal 'n herwinbare huis bou met ou bottels, bokse en ander herwinbare materiale. Kyk! Ek het hierdie goed op pad huis toe opgetel. Dis langs die pad en buite die spazawinkels weggegooi.â€

SourceText: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œWhat a good idea, {F1_DAUGHTER_13}! Sounds like youâ€™ve thought about this a lot and want to put a lot of effort into your homework. How do you want me to help you?â€
text: **{F1_FATHER}**: "Wat 'n goeie idee, {F1_DAUGHTER_13}! Dit klink asof jy baie hieroor gedink het en baie moeite met jou huiswerk wil doen. Hoe wil jy hÃª moet ek jou help?"

SourceText: **{F1_DAUGHTER_13}**: â€œCould you help me clean these bottles? They will be the pillars of the house. I will make the boxes into the walls and roof of the house. Later, I thought we could paint the boxes and bottles so they look beautiful.â€
text: **{F1_DAUGHTER_13}**: â€œKan Pa my help om hierdie bottels skoon te maak? Dit gaan die pilare van die huis wees. Ek gaan die bokse gebruik vir die mure en die dak van die huis. Ek het gedink ons kan later die bokse en bottels verf sodat hulle mooi lyk.â€

SourceText: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œI may have some leftover paint outside the house. I can take a look later.â€
text: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œEk het dalk nog 'n bietjie oorskietverf buite. Ek kan later gaan kyk.â€

SourceText: (Later in the day)
text: (Later die dag)

SourceText: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œWow, it looks different now! It does not look like you used rubbish at all anymore. You also painted the walls and the roof beautifully! I think your teacher will be proud of you when she sees your homework!â€
text: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œSjoe, dit lyk nou anders! Dit lyk glad nie meer asof jy rommel gebruik het nie. Jy het ook die mure en die dak pragtig geverf! Ek dink jou onderwyser gaan baie trots wees wanneer sy jou huiswerk sien!â€

SourceText: **{F1_DAUGHTER_13}**: â€œThank you for your help, {F1_FATHER}. You know, there were a lot of fun things that happened in school today.â€
text: **{F1_DAUGHTER_13}**: â€œDankie vir Pa se hulp. Weet Pa, daar het vandag 'n klomp prettige goed by die skool gebeur.â€

SourceText: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œGo ahead, tell me!â€
text: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œMaar vertel vir my!â€

SourceText: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œ{F1_DAUGHTER_16}, I noticed you have less energy today and you look sad. Do you want to talk about it?â€

SourceText: **{F1_DAUGHTER_16}**: â€œOh, {F1_FATHER}. I studied so hard for my maths test and failed. I feel so sad and frustrated.â€

SourceText: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œThat is frustrating, my girl. I know how hard you studied. Maybe we can come up with a new plan to help you with maths. Should we ask your teacher for extra help? Would you like me to talk to her or do you want to do it?â€
text: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œDit is frustrerend, my kind. Ek weet hoe hard jy geleer het. Miskien kan ons met 'n nuwe plan vorendag kom om jou met Wiskunde te help. Moet ons jou onderwyser vra vir ekstra hulp? Wil jy hÃª ek moet met haar praat, of wil jy dit self doen?â€

text: **{F1_DAUGHTER_16}**: â€œDankie, Pa. Ek kan dit doen! Ek dink dis dalk 'n goeie idee.â€

SourceText: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œYou know, maths may be difficult for you, but I am so proud of you for studying so hard, {F1_DAUGHTER_16}. Other people might give up, but you keep trying. That will help you so much in life!â€
text: **{F1_FATHER}**: â€œWeet jy, Wiskunde is dalk vir jou moeilik, maar ek is so trots op jou dat jy so hard leer, {F1_DAUGHTER_16}. Ander mense sou dalk tou opgegooi het, maar jy hou aan probeer. Dit sal jou in die lewe so baie help!â€
